post.description: Use this API to get the cashier page address. After getting the cashier page address, you can redirect the user to the cashier page to make a payment.

normalUrl.description: The normal URL for vaulting session

resultCode.description:
The result code.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

resultStatus.description:
The result status. Valid values are:  

S: Indicates that the result status is successful. 
F: Indicates that the result status is failed. 
U: Indicates that the result status is unknown.

resultMessage.description:
The result message.

More information:

Maximum length: 256 characters

disputeId.description:
The unique ID that is assigned by Antom to identify a dispute.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

disputeEvidenceType.description:
The type of dispute evidence you can download. Valid values are:

DISPUTE_EVIDENCE_TEMPLATE: the pre-filled dispute evidence template, which is a valuable tool for improving the success rate of your defense. We highly recommend downloading this template to ensure all necessary information is included in your defense document. For a template sample with pre-filled information, see Merchant Letter.
DISPUTE_EVIDENCE_FILE: the dispute evidence file uploaded by the supplyDefenseDocument API.
More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

result.description: The result of the API call.

disputeEvidence.description:
The dispute evidence that is encoded in the Based64 format. Decode the Base64 document to get the Word or PDF file.

Note: This prameter is returned when the value of resultCode is SUCCESS.

More information:

Maximum length: 1000000 characters

disputeEvidenceFormat.description:
The document format of the dispute evidence. Valid values are:

WORD: indicates that the format of the dispute evidence is Word.
PDF: indicates that the format of the dispute evidence is PDF.
ZIP: indicates that the format of the dispute evidence is ZIP.
JPG: indicates that the format of the dispute evidence is JPG.
Note: This prameter is returned when the value of resultCode is SUCCESS.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters
